document.discussion_title: Box office hits and misses: ‘Suicide Squad’ stays on top as ‘Ben-Hur’ flops
document.topic_text: Suicide Squad and Sausage Party continued to reign supreme at the box office, beating out three new releases that include the big-budget Ben-Hur remake, which had a disappointing (for the studio) debut in theaters. »
document.post: Suicide Squad and Sausage Party continued to reign supreme at the box office, beating out three new releases that include the big-budget Ben-Hur remake, which had a disappointing (for the studio) debut in theaters. »
